subject: Re: [junit] Android Notification Bar Testing
msgSnippet: I m assuming this is the same problem you asked about before, when you were using Robotium for automation.  You will definitely have better odds of an answer
messageBody:
I'm assuming this is the same problem you asked about before, when you were
using Robotium for automation. You will definitely have better odds of an
answer if you ask on a Robotium forum.

David Saff
